successes.title: RiffTrax will Riff GODZILLA & ANACONDA in Cinemas Nationwide
successes.description: You can help the Rifftrax / MST3K guys get the 1998 version of GODZILLA starring Matthew Broderick for their next nationwide simulcast!

Pledges.description: THANK YOU PAGE. Your personal name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com! AND the satisfaction that you helped give GODZILLA the riffing it deserves.  ALSO as a Kickstarter backer at any level, we try to give exclusive perks during the year - like secret passwords for early access to Live Show tickets whenever possible including this GODZILLA show in Nashville.

1 NEVER-BEFORE-RIFFED SHORT. Digital download of classic short film: A CASE OF SPRING FEVER, which was an MST3K classic, with an all-new riff by Mike, Kevin and Bill! Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com!

SHORTS COLLECTION - 3 NEVER-BEFORE-RIFFED SHORTS. Digital download of the new riff of A CASE OF SPRING FEVER plus all-new riffs of classic short film DUCK AND COVER, and a never-before riffed short from the fan favorite series AT YOUR FINGERTIPS (GRASSES, CYLINDERS). Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com!
SHORTS COLLECTION PLUS ONE. Everything at the $10 level plus a certificate for a digital download of ANY FULL-LENGTH RIFFTRAX MP3 of your choice, from our existing catalogue. SUPREME VALUE!!!

GODZILLA RIFFTRAX MP3 DOWNLOAD PACKAGE! Digital MP3 download of a studio version of the GODZILLA RiffTrax commentary written for the August 2014 Live show.  We can't get the rights to merge the jokes and the movie so you get the MP3 of the jokes that you need to sync with the movie. PLUS a $15 RiffTrax CERTIFICATE to compensate you for having to shell out for the movie of GODZILLA to play in sync with your MP3.  It will be delivered on the Digital Release Date (approximately 60 days after the Live Show.) Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com.
GODZILLA RIFFTRAX MP3 DOWNLOAD PACKAGE + SHORTS COLLECTION. Everything in the $20 level plus the SHORTS COLLECTION.

GODZILLA RIFFTRAX MP3 DOWNLOAD PACKAGE + SHORTS COLLECTION + EXTRA FULL-LENGTH RIFFTRAX OF YOUR CHOICE. Everything in the $25 reward level PLUS a certificate good for a digital download of ANY FULL-LENGTH RIFFTRAX MP3 of your choice, from our existing catalogue.
THE FULL PACKAGE, ONE WEEK EARLY. Everything in the $30.00 reward package PLUS: you get it one week before the digital release date, with a bonus introduction by Mike, Kevin and Bill!

THE FULL PACKAGE, ONE WEEK EARLY + DIGITAL GOODIE PACK! Everything in the $40.00 reward package plus a digital goodie pack. Includes, at a minimum, cool stuff like a digital signed copy of rehearsal script, digital live show avatars from artist Len Peralta, digital signed thank-you photo from Mike Nelson, Kevin Murphy, and Bill Corbett.

THE FULL PACKAGE + EARLY + DIGITAL GOODIES + VIDEO THANK-YOU. Everything in the $50 reward package, PLUS your personal name personally thanked not only on a thank-you page, but a thank-you VIDEO where Mike Nelson, Kevin Murphy and Bill Corbett thank everyone personally by name, with personal thanks!

EVERYTHING FROM ABOVE + EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT. Everything in the $60 rewards package plus... RiffTrax Kickstarter Commemorative T-Shirt designed by artist Adam Koford, who draws stuff for Disney and also created our three-man cartoon logo! This T-Shirt will not be available anywhere else.

INVITATION TO OUR PLANNING SESSION. Everything in the $75.00 reward package plus... an exclusive access code to watch an online planning session / rehearsal for the Live Show. A glimpse behind the curtain, if you dare. [NOTE: Most features of this reward would come post-show in November 2014, but the planning session would be available in early August, before the live show]
ALL OF THE ABOVE + RIFFTRAX POSTER. Everything in the $90.00 reward package plus... A full-sized poster from one of our Fathom Events live shows.

YOUR NAME ONSCREEN. Everything in the $100.00 rewards package plus: YOUR name in the credits at the end of the RiffTrax Live show in August! Immortality is yours. (Must have your name to RiffTrax no later than July 10th to be included - we'll email you with details after the kickstarter is over.)

AUTOGRAPHED RIFFTRAX LIVE SHOW POSTER.  Everything in the $150.00 reward package plus... Your full-sized poster you got from the $100 level will be personally hand autographed by Mike Nelson, Kevin Murphy and Bill Corbett.

YOUR FACE ONSCREEN. Everything in the $175 rewards package plus... your name AND PHOTO at the end of the RiffTrax Live show in August. So much YOU! (Must have your approved name and photo to RiffTrax no later than July 10th to be included - we'll email you with details after the kickstarter is over.)
GET MIKE NELSON'S SCRIPT FROM THE SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Mike during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET KEVIN MURPHY'S SCRIPT FROM THE SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Kevin during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET BILL CORBETT'S SCRIPT FROM THE SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Bill during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
NEW!
GET MIKE NELSON'S SCRIPT FROM THE ANACONDA SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Mike during our ANACONDA Live Show, autographed to you personally!
NEW!
GET KEVIN MURPHY'S SCRIPT FROM THE ANACONDA SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Kevin during the ANACONDA Live Show, autographed to you personally!
NEW!
GET BILL CORBETT'S SCRIPT FROM THE ANACONDA SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Bill during the ANACONDA Live Show, autographed to you personally!

PERSONALIZED SONG! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: Mr. Kevin Murphy will write / produce / deliver a personalized one-minute+ song, commissioned by you!  You can check out the ones he did for our last Kickstarter on iTunes.  (Search "Starship Troopers Kickstarter" in the iTunes store to listen.)

WRITE A RIFF FOR THE GODZILLA LIVE SHOW!  Everything in the $250 rewards package PLUS you will get to write a riff for the GODZILLA Live Show. We'll give you the scene and space for the joke, and you get to write your own comedy gold which will be performed by Mike, Kevin or Bill during the Live Show.  You will even get a "Kickstarter Guest Writer" credit in the end credits of the show, and you will be mentored by the RiffTrax writers to make sure all goes smoothly. (Riff must be approved by RiffTrax.)
NEW!

WRITE A RIFF FOR ANACONDA! Everything in the $250 rewards package PLUS you will get to write a riff for the ANACONDA Live Show. We'll give you the scene and space for the joke, and you get to write your own comedy gold which will be performed by Mike, Kevin or Bill during the October ANACONDA Live Show. You will even get a "Kickstarter Guest Writer" credit in the end credits of the show, and you will be mentored by the RiffTrax writers to make sure all goes smoothly. (Riff must be approved by RiffTrax.)
